page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The area's character has developed as a result of the significant{chalk {hills}which dominate the landscape and have provided house and road builders with significant challenges. The main road passing well to the north of this area has helped preserve the tranquil atmosphere encountered here. A predominantly agricltural community has an interesting number of professional people living amongst it, with the{parish church}and its fringe activities keeping the{community together. The lack of services and amenities is made up by for by the very close ties within the community and there are enough local jobs for those who need them
